}} 'STS-120' was a space shuttle mission to the International Space Station
(ISS) that launched on 23 October 2007 from the Kennedy Space Center,
Florida. The mission is also referred to as 'ISS-10A' by
the ISS program. STS-120 delivered the [[Harmony (ISS module)|Harmony]] module
and reconfigured a portion of the station in preparation for future assembly
missions. STS-120 was flown by Space Shuttle
''Discovery'', and was the twenty-third space shuttle mission to the ISS.
